application_rates: 3-6 Kg / Bigha (33 decimal); 4-8 Kg / Bigha (33 decimal); 200-300 gm / Tree; Both before and after sowing/transplanting it can be used as broadcast.
crops_pests: Rice, Wheat & Maize; Potato, Chili, Tomato, Brinjal, Potol, Cabbages, Cauliflowers etc.; Mango, Banana, Jackfruit, Papaya and others fruits.
crops: Rice, Wheat, Maize, Potato, Chili, Tomato, Brinjal, Potol, Cabbages, Cauliflowers, Mango, Banana, Jackfruit, Papaya
